Those who are stating Miss USA is not so """"attractive"""" & claiming it was """"set-up"""" instead of supporting such a beautiful, strong & intelligent woman; please stop this negativity & ugliness. We are better than this.

Sound as though you are still in space, remember you were the one who asked what lies he told, now you are dismissive of those lies, What about the lies he told the students at Trump's University some lost their life saving, which some students said the """"University"""" was nothing more than a an """"infomercial on steroids"""", he is very good at making a disclaimer before he tells a lie, """"I heard"""", """"someone say"""". Okay multiple sources said he's worth 4 billion plus, not a problems, release his taxes then we would all know for sure, something every presidential candidate has done for the past 60 years. News flash, you probably miss traveling through space, they have had nine investigations spent 26 million of tax payers dollars on those investigations and found nothing incriminating against secretary Clinton, that means no lies were told, so when you get back to this time period you need to contact somebody and let them know that you know something that 9 hearings and 26 million taxpayers dollars couldn't uncover. Same thing with the email server, they've had a number of hearings and spent another 25 million on the taxpayers dime, so finding nothing. We haven't finished investigating yet, more tax payers money. Now a couple of questions questions for you, who are the """"multiple sources""""? What are the """"numerous contradictions""""
